Class LccUiSelect

java.lang.Object

      br.ufmg.lcc.arangitester.ui.LccUiSelect
All Implemented Interfaces:
LccICreate, LccIRequest, LccIUiComponent, java.lang.Iterable<LccIUiComponent>
public class LccUiSelect
extends LccUiComponent
implements LccIRequest, LccICreate

Represent a simple select tag on HTML. This component can do request to server.

Author:
Lucas Gonçalves
